text: ghathana ralla pilikul hela dakinawa - asad sali 11-07-18
paris upan dina sadayak

bauddha aagamika wathawath walin siyalu denata aarakshawa setha shanthiya prarthana karamin bhikshun wahansela seth pirith sajjhayana kala athara janasampradayata anuwa sathara watin suba nimithi pahala karamin mal wasi wati aashirwadaya ek kirimada boho denage sathutata hethu wiya.
weri hindunu miniha maha hayiyen andanna patangaththalu.

‘mulin wu parichchedawala prakasha karana lada paridi, jyeshta polis niladharin wisin menma ewakata pawathi rajaye deshapalanagnyayeku (ee deshapalanagnyaya thamayi ranil wikramasinha) manawa ayithiwasikam barapathala lesa ullanghanaya karanu labu aakaraya api wisin nirikshanaya kota atha…
ruwan oba da shirshaya yanna "shrirsha" kiya dosha sahithawa liya aluth wachanayakata mula pada athi bawa pene.
saba sinhala nayakathwakak,niwarada aarthika kramaya k ada natha.ma kiyanne nathiwadaya ,paskam pinawima awama karana ayaku natha.

mewara kalapaya sadaha padaka wanne widulibala saha balashakthi awashyatha sadaha wikalpa balashakthi prabhawayan yodagath diwayine wiwidha pradeshawala diwi gewana jana kotaswala prayogika athdakimwe.

premadasa janadhipathithuma nerapu witadida sirilaka bihiwu kruthahasthama deshapalanagnyayaku wu gamini disanayaka mathindun pakshaya hara noyamata gath thiranaya wareka ohu lankadipayata kiya pawe mepariddeni
api punchi kalaye gandara jiwath weddi, mathara santha sarweshasaye igena ganiddi, ape amma ho thaththa, samajaye mewani thanakata ada api eewi yayi kisida hithannata natha.
halmaldandiyath iwarayihalmaldandiyath iwarayi
wyayam karannath niyamayi …
ehema naththe oya umbaa kiyana desimalda monawada binduwakwath nathi nisa wenta athi.

pasuwa pawathi masika sayana walata ohu paminiyeth thaniyamayi.ehidi ohuge pahadili honda athata siduwu wenaskam dutuwa.ape poddoisiwara wedaduru gana kament labunu pasu giya post eken passe ee gana liyanna hithuna.

rajaye hamudawanta muhunadimata nohaki nisa kese ho thawath pansiyadenaku balahathkarayen ho eltitieeyata ekathu kirime pa්rabala uthsahayeka koti nayakayan nirathawa sitina bawa uthuren labena aluthma aaranchi margawala sandahan weyi.
"mama hithanne oya kathawata uththara dena eka mata adala na.
eeth eekata awasthawak denne naha..
siyalu denata bohoma sthuthiyi adahas dakwima gana.
pita biththiyak gawinma wage galawala bassanam ohoma wenna..
anthimata ithuru wenne pasuthawima yi dukayi witharayi.

siyawas gananakata epita roma rajyayaye mahath peraliyakata mula piru kristhus wahanse pilibanda puwatha adin siyawasa kata epita rama rajyayaye minis sith sathan wenas karalime karyayata magak heli karalima puduma andame daiwopagatha siduwimaki.eya siduwuye me aakarayataya.
ee palamu warata riyadhi fahd jathyanthara kridanganayata kanthawanta athuluwimata waram labadimath samagayi.
mahasohon pilliya	04/19/2015
medawasa lankawe prakata deshapalanagnyayaku da edawasa lanka obaroyi hotalaye kanishta sewakayaku lesa rajakari kala bawa ma asa athath ehi sathyasathyathawa pilibanda mama no danimi.
waks kiyanne iti wage drawyak.
eekakama kumakda?mama obata kalpana karayi.
hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathata erehiwa udghoshanaya kala siyalu dena samanya demala wasiyan bawayi ohu wadiduratath sandahan kara thibenne.
wes muna wunath wesak muna wunath kiyawenne pitin da ganna munak gana ne...
ee hinda mama kiyannada?
ohuta pahara di maha margaye adagena giya.
eeth ada ape rata thula yahapalanaya prajathanthrawadaya ithamath hondin kriyathmaka yi.
jesu thumange dutha karyaye mul kalaye siduwimaka me gana pra kasha wenawa.
ma langa ee liyum thama athi ...
bodhinwahanleta wamya)kona ruwangeyi wada hun . . .
aawoth agamathi kamaya.
eeka hodata mathaka thiyaganin.."
/* pasalata ho daham pasalata aadhara pinisa labena 'kotu kola' mahangu aadayam margayaki.
wyangayen ho illimak nokarama labunu wasthrayama katinayata sudusu weyi.
apa rathri gini malaya wenath karyakshama aakarayakata himikaragena sitinawa wina in idiriyata chalanaya wi nathi bawa ehidi athwindinnata haki wanu atha.
eheth ee siyalla aawa - giya pamani.
adhyapanaya aran balanna api katada aayojanaya karanna oone.
elama thamayi henri sar.
ee dekata mila dekak wima sadharanayi.
kusal janith ahimi wima dawantha paduwak wuwath chandimal aarambhaka pithikaru lesa thama wagakima manawin itu karaganimin siti.
pa්ra්rashnaya- mithotamulla kunu kandata yatawela manushya jiwitha wishala sankhyawak ratata ahimiwi thibenawa.
mama thama kiwwe naha mema mrudukangaya magin sidukarana karyaya..
owun siyalu denama wage eka dekata kotunowi ara ma kalin sandahan kala paridi katagari kihipayakata nirmanayan idiripath karanawa.
ape bahu-bhasha paribhogika sewa kalamanakaruwan siyalu paribhogika awashyatha niwaradiwa awabodha karagena, sampurna giwisum ha pasuwa, pera karmanthaya pramukha sewa pramithi sapayimata wada.

asubawadiwa pihitana lada senasuruge maha dasha ho athuru dashawaladi nathinam asubawa pihitana lada wenath grahayakuge anthar dashawakadi wam padaya binda damannata senasuru kisisethma maliwanne natha.
oonama deyak thiyenna oone thana ikmawa giyama, aapahu eeka thiyenna oone thanata watenawa.
deshakaya bearuwakwath kiwwada???
ee kapati kanthawa awith thiyenne mudal laba gannayi.
agamathithumage japan sancharaye nila katayuthu ada arambaayi
"godak hondayi duwe" ritak wage usa mage prinsipal madam , bada langinma dekata namila mata mage shild eka dena gaman kiwwa ada wage mathakayi!!!
nidimatha berenawa as deken mama ehema kiwwe na hithuwa witharayi..kiwwe menna mehema.

aththama kiyanawanam ape panthiyata me karadare sidu wune ekama eka dawasak witharayi.eeth edath api kohomahari wishabijanashaka bothal bhagayak iwara wenakan panthiya sodala thamayi wada patan gaththe.awasanawata ape eha panthiye lamayi nam echchara wasanawantha wune naha.mata mathaka widiyata ee panthiye dore agula kadilayi thibune,ehemath nathnam boho dawasata dora wahala yanna me asarana daruwanta amathaka wuna.
eka ithin kalinma kiyala thiyenna athine....
ow ayi uba dakala thiyanawada kiyala??? …..
kihipa wathawak thaththata ee gana wyangayen kiwwath thaththage wyanjana bedima aduwuneth na.
peralagena hari yanna puluwan nayakayakuta katha karala me agamathikama dunne' maithri kiweya.
rijant widi nawathane mage kamaraya thawaduratath unusumwa kal gewannata haki thanak nowana baw watahennata gaththe ehi widuru panela widagena shithalaya kamarayata wadinnata gath thana ya.
mage daham pasal jiwithaya masayakata sima wuna hethuwa udara gunadam sitha daruwo kiyana mathrukawen liyanna hethuwa daham pasal walata yana ayata wada mama sanwara bawa pasak karanna.
sanwidhanaya eksath jathinge aahara ha krushikarma sanwidhanaya samanga krushikarmika samupakara sanwardhanaya sandaha awabodhatha giwisumak athikaragani.
palamu wargaye diyawadiyawa swayan prathishakthi thaththwayak wana athara ehidi insiyulin nishpadanayata haniwima ho sapalawath nowima dakiya hakiyi.
aananda widyalaya (dewani inima) – ek kadullak dawi lakunu 10 (panduwara 5) sampurna warthawa: wels kumaruwan parada santha thomas widuhalata thiyunu jayak!
ta labadima.mulinma api meka udaharanayak ekka balamu...api hithamu me sankhya peliya thiyenne 4 3 2 1 kiyala.
eheth prathipala uda wuye nosithu widiyakin ma ya.

‘‘mama stha්rin samanga lingika sabandatha pawathwanne natha.’’ [meya thewana silpadaya samanga patalawa noganna] 80 dashakaya mada wana thuru wamanshika deshapalanaye kendraya wuye kamkaru panthi deshapalanayayi.

shri lanka kridakayo satanata basithi...
nadu thinduwedi luthinan alfrad wijesuriyata ha sarayan amaradasa rathnayakata barapathala wada athiwa dasaya awurudu sira danduwamak niyama wuha.

ee nisa namika washayen ee ratawalata gos ledak damagena nawatha lankawata pamina wenath eejansikaruwaku haraha wenath ratakata gos ee wenuwen thawath laksha kihipayak mudal labaganimata unanduwak dakwana kanthawo sitithi.

guruwarayek, waidyawarayek, polis na
wegawath swarayen katha karamin aya aanduwa handunwanne ”towald” hatiyataya.

apa ihatha pilithuru soyamin sitina janathawa yomukala yuthuwa thibenuye eliya thibena thanata nowa yathura wati athi thanataya.polisiya magin widhimath parikshanayak sidukirima, chudithayinta saha aparadhakarunda minisun lesa salakima , janamadhya sadacharathmaka wima, saha janathawa pawathina thathwaya awabodha karaganu aththe saha pawathina aakalpayan wenaskala haki wanuye minisun wenas kirimakin pamanak wanu atha.polisiya magin niwaradi aparadhakaruwa alwa ganu athayi ho danata allagena aththe saba aparadhakaruyayi (samaharawita polisiyata thamange galawima sadaha chodana sahitha wenath dubalayakuda aparadhakaru kirimata hakiya) wishwasa kirimen ha ohuta daduwam labadima ho ella mara damimen siyalla wisadenne natha.apa athiwi thibena gataluwa pilibada samajayak lesa mewani gatalu sadaha wisadum sewima aarambha kala yuthuwa atha.

parlimenthuwa wenas wune naha.

shri lankawe pamanak nowa mulu aasiyanu kalapayema itha wadagath jaiwa urumayangen samanwitha theth bim pradeshayak lesa handunagatha haki muthurajawela abhaya bhumiya aashritha theth bim parisara paddhathiya kshirapayinge sita krumi sathun dakwa wihidi pathirunu itha pruthula jaiwa wiwidhathwayakin yuthu shri lankawe wishishtathama parisarika kalapayaki.
namuth dakshinanshika swis janatha pakshaye parlimenthu manthri lusi stam mema adahasata wiruddhathwaya pala kala ayek.
budu dahamata anuwa minisa nirmanaya wanne rupa, wedana, sangnya, sankhara, winynyana yana panchaskandhayeni.
ema jalashaye yalith ek wan doratuwak ada perawaru 10 sita swayankriyawa wiwrutha wi thibe.
"thaniyen sitina kota danena thanikamata wada ,godak dara ganna amaru thanikamak thamayi wiwahaya thula kenek thani wena eka..."

ithin moko me eka paratama?"
jiwikawata wada sangithaya kere wu premaya balawath wu nisa ya. 1974 di ohu sewayen paha karamin aayathana sangrahaya yatathe liyumak gedarata ewa thibuni.
eheth ee athara samanya samaja stharawala tharuna tharuniyoda wishala pramanayak sitina bawa me chayarupawalinma oppu wi yanawa atha.
athulu siyaluma samaja web adawi thahanam kirimata piyawara gena thibena bawayi wartha wanne.
eheth, awussana lada aathma abhimanayakin saha thaman rawatana ladde yayi yana kopayakin siti pirisakage samuhika hangim samanga satan kirimehila owun samathun wuye nowe.
"mama gowithana gana danna nisa thamayi me wadapiliwela aarambha kale.
me enawa mahaththayo..
amathithumage bi.em.dabliw rathayath pawule pradowath padawana dharma ema rakiyawatath samudi ape eejansiyata badenawa.
wayasa awurudu 8 k wana ema dariya pasal panthi kamaraye sitiyadi ema sthanayata pamini kisiyam pudgalayaku dariyata lingika apayojanaya sidu kara atha.
man thunweni wathawath damma.
koyi thanala kothana giyath ehemayi.
ethakota ara mulin labenawayi kiyapu salli ?
samahara eewa wikunanawa..
ehema adahasakin liwwe naha.
thamayi..samahara kattiya paramparikawa pawathagena ena eewa marana manchakayata yanakal pana dagena raka gannawane.
eyata dirghakalina wadapiliwelak awashyayi.
mamath boru kiwwe na...math kiwwa "ow akke ehema deyak mage hithe thiyenawa eeth mata eeka eyata kiya ganna baruwayi inne" kiyala.
ee kiyanne obata ganna oona dewal punchi koleka liyaganna.
pahuwada ude biththiya parana purudu widihata thibuna.
naya gewima pilibandawa kewal kirimata hakinam ee sambandhayen api awadhanaya yomu kala yuthuwa thibenawa.
apata bawwo nathi nisa ee kathawa danagena hitiye nane....oyage chuti bawwage wasagamath oonnohe kiyala danna ane....
namuth masa kipayakinma amma eya athhara damuwe ammata eeta wada boho de pawula wenuwen itu kirimata thibu bawini.
meya eekiya pudgalayin sambandhayen pamanak nowa kandayam sambandhayenda aththaya.
rajaye aayathana 10 k mahajana badu mudalin yapima nathara karayi
as ekalas karagath mohothe ee mesaya matha wu katu satahan gonne liya thibunu me pada wal samanmalige netha gatuna..
wasara 3 1/2kata pasu solhayim heli kala “rahasa” |

mema thathwayen midennata athi wishwasaniya andame kriyawaliyak thula miyanmaraye dawantha sanskruthika, janawargika ha aagamika wiwidhathwaya sakalyayenma walanda ganna miyanmar jathika ananyathawak pilibanda nawa awabodhayak nirmanaya kirima adangu kara ganima awashya wenawa atha.
"ah hari hari mata waradila wenna athi.sori" ehema kiyapu aseli durakathanaya wisandhi kare tharahen.
aa wath amathaka wunada?
pudgalikawa mage mathaya thamayi pujya kenek wadarakadi wadi karma pramanayak ras karanawa.
mema jathiwadi udghoshanayehi nayakathwaya eekabaddha wipakshaya saha ehima anek paththa wana pohottu pakshaya usulathi.
meyin peniyanne diwarathri wehesena parikshaka shreniye ho kosthapalwarun nowa rate polispathi deshapalakaya ge asuji kamata kisidu hirikithayak nathi bawaki.
janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mathithuma pa්ramukha mathi amathiwarun athulu pirisak mita ekwa sitiyaha.
me athara wintarfel waladi ramsi kalin wiwaha wenna porondu dipu miranda ekka tikak thadabala kathawak wenawa.
sama dipthimath kirima githel mangin sama pirisudu karamin same thethamanaya aaraksha kara de.
me mulawen galawi sathyaya awabodha kara ganimata budu rajanan wahanse widarshana bhawanawa lokayata iganwu seka.
mama dan eeka amathaka karanawa.
atham  balawath ratawal hamudawe yuda jayagrahanayanta  nigraha karanawa jyeshta adhinithignya gomin dayasiri
dawasak diki dan lokudayi malligen asu wita ohu kiwe "ow, dan uu ta kakulak ussala chu dannath puluwan" yanuweni.
aldinige hithata aawe serafim gana owun tikakata kalin kathabahe yeduna dewalya.
rata hadana hati sunil handunneththi ratatama kiyayi...
thaththatath meka bari wuna.
awasana dinayata dawas hathakata issarayi mama eeka sampurna kale.
palamuwa lakunu 08k laba sumudu samaga sama thathwaye pathwu aya hiti hatiyoma thewana sthanayata ada dama atha.
lajjawata path tharunaya pasupasa asune wadiwana lesa ayata kiya.

kisidu adahasak nathiwa kamara thibu paliyata duwayana teliwishankarayoda apa nodun ayage ammala, akkala handa walapena ayuru da, kohe ho nawaka wadha siduwimak elidaraw wu wigasa dewaruda wegayen aawesha wi ‘shishya mardanaya, aanduwe kumanthrana‘ athulu wasara gananak pilunu wi athi wachana kisidu ahillak balillakin thorawa atharina antharaye nannaththara kathandarada siya kamarawala purawagena with salayata atharinnata patan gena atha.
namuth mama me kiyapu kisi deyak chithrapatiyata adala wenne na.
mema sadhaka anuwa mehi samaja widyathmaka karana, mano widyathmaka karana menma aagamika karanawan da baddha wi athi baw pahadiliya.
me kathawa poddak ahala thibbata ada thamayi hariyatama danagaththe.
wirodhatha aramuna eya ayipad witharak kridawak wana meya …..
yukthiyata ninda yama (eeth daruwek - meth daruwek) anthar wishwawidyalayiya shishya bala mandalaye kandawumkaru wu sanjiwa bandara pereda (20) rimand karana ladi.
owun wairasayata prathirodhida?
oya wage kottoruwo hama thana ma!

abhiyachana yatathe ruhunu wishwawidyalayata bandawagath sisuwiya wishwawidyalayata athulath wime siyalu sudusukam sapura athi bawath pawathina kramawedaya yatathe bandawa gena athi bawath usas adhyapana amathi es.bi. disanayaka mahatha parlimenthuwe di eeye (21) prakasha kaleya.niwaradi abhiyachana kriyapatipatiya yatathe ema sisuwiya ruhunu wishwawidyalayata bandawa gath bawath ema patamalawa hadarimata awashya pramanayata wada wadi ised lakanu aya sathu bawath ki disanayaka mahatha abhiyachana yatathe 2011 wasare pamanak daruwan 503 denekuta sarasawi waram labuna bawath heli kaleya.wipaksha nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahatha wisin 23(2) yatathe nagana lada prashnayakata pilithuru demin ese ki amathiwaraya abhiyachana pramada wana wita boho daruwan thaman danna deshapalanagnyayakuge margayen lipiyak ewana bawath ewa siyalla thama wishwawidyala prathipadana komisamata yomu karana bawath kiya.wishwawidyalawalata athulath wima sandaha abhiyachanayak idiripath kirimedi karunu 3k sapiriya yuthu bawath niyamitha mudala bankuwata gewa laba gath kuwithansiya samanga abhiyachanayata hethu dakwa wishwawidyala prathipadana komisama wetha eya idiripath kala yuthu bawath usas adhyapana amathiwaraya pawasiya.wishwawidyala praweshaya sandaha usas pela prathipala nikuth wi awama kadaim lakunuwalata wishwawidyalayata thora gath pasu ee sandaha awasthawak nothibunu wita abhiyachanayak idiripath karanu atha.
